text:
As a Bed & Breakfast owner and a serious online bargain-shopper, I happened upon this product while searching for the best price on K-Cups. Needless to say, I serve a LOT of coffee! Unique in appearance, the San Francisco Bay Coffee Fog Chaser K-Cups deliver a great cup of coffee! As other reviews state, you'll notice a heavenly, strong coffee aroma when opening the air-tight plastic packaging. Once opened, I store my Fog Chaser K-Cups in an empty, (clean) large metal coffee can. It not only keeps the aroma intact, it keeps the K-Cups nice and fresh for brewing.

If you haven't already tried these K-Cups, do! I think you'll be impressed - and pleased that you don't have to pay top-dollar for a quality product!
